title: [Large-scale] Instructional Design Project for AI-Driven Innovation in Mathematics Education

context.prior_knowledge: Foundations of Mathematics Education Theory and Experience with Online Learning Platforms
context.additional_context: Designing AI-integrated lessons using personal devices and conducting projects to develop generative AI systems for mathematics education.

learning_goals: Learners will design a system that uses generative AI models (e.g., GPT-4, Claude) to automatically generate ≥10 math problems across three difficulty levels (beginner/intermediate/advanced) and recommend appropriate problem sets based on learner diagnostic results. Generated problems must receive ≥80% suitability ratings on an expert evaluation rubric: clarity, difficulty, and educational relevance.
Develop the capability to implement a math learning data visualization and feedback system using AI analysis tools
Strengthen the competency to develop AI-based math education scenarios using PBL methods and apply them to real classroom environments
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
